page.title: 08" COUNTRY VENTURE" TEBAY
page.content: In 1863 the school was built with one class room,it had a very high roof.The only form of heating was an open fire & all the heat went up in the ceiling & escaped.When the railway came to Tebay more people moved in so they built another classroom;the main hall was used for{3}more classes.It was converted in October 1982 and was finished in late April 1984.The place is now used for parties of children to stay there;it can accommodate 40.It is situated at the edge of Tebay 1/4 of a mile from M6 juction 38 and midway between the Lakes and Dales. It is owned and run by"MR & MRS CLARK" { PRICE TARIFF-DAILY RATE} Under 12 years...............Â£6.90 Under 18 years...............Â£7.36 Adults.......................Â£8.05 { {ALL PRICES INCLUDE V.A.T.
